meanings.definition: A person or thing that lures.
meanings.sent1: The lurers set up a trap to catch the curious animals.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen used shiny lures as lurers to attract the fish.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoon acted as a lurers to lead the dog on a wild chase.
meanings.sent4: Her sweet voice was a lurers, drawing in listeners like bees to honey.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the flowers acted as lurers, inviting butterflies to visit.

meanings.sent1: The forest was filled with lurers, each trying to outshine the other.
meanings.sent2: The team of lurers worked together to attract customers to the new store.
meanings.sent3: The group of lurers gathered around the campfire, sharing stories of their adventures.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of lurers, each one vying for attention.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a paradise of lurers, each bloom more beautiful than the last.
